long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Links are too long.  With a simple right-click, now you can shorten them and send them right to your clipboard.  No more confusing, unreadable emails or private messages.  And if you want to share some text?  Just right click and the short-version is in your clipboard.  Another click and you will get the QR code (those square barcodes) for it!
